mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT D.EXPRIEM_NM , B.EXPRIEM_SEQNO FROM IM_REQEST A INNER JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM B ON A.REQEST_SEQNO = B.REQEST_SEQNO INNER JOIN SY_EXPRIEM D ON B.EXPRIEM_SEQNO = D.EXPRIEM_SEQNO WHERE A.REQEST_SEQNO IN
#{reqestSeqno}
AND B.DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE RS_MHRLS_INSPCT_CRRCT_ACCTO_DT SET INSPCT_CRRCT_PREARNGE_DTE = (SELECT (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (INSPCT_CRRCT_CYCLE * SCC1.TMPR_FIELD1_VALUE),'YYYY-MM-DD') ) FROM RS_MHRLS_INSPCT_CRRCT_ACCTO_DT A JOIN SY_CMMN_CODE SCC1 ON A.INSPCT_CRRCT_CYCLE_CODE = SCC1.CMMN_CODE WHERE MHRLS_SEQNO = #{mhrlsSeqno} AND INSPCT_CRRCT_SE_CODE = #{inspctCrrctSeCode}) ,RECENT_INSPCT_CRRCT_DTE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,LAST_CHANGER_ID = #{lastChangerId} ,LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MHRLS_SEQNO = #{mhrlsSeqno} AND INSPCT_CRRCT_SE_CODE = #{inspctCrrctSeCode}
mapper.select: SELECT A.MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO ,A.REQEST_SEQNO ,B.LOT_ID ,B.REQEST_DTE ,C.MHRLS_NM FROM RS_MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_REQEST A LEFT OUTER JOIN IM_REQEST B ON A.REQEST_SEQNO = B.REQEST_SEQNO LEFT OUTER JOIN RS_MHRLS C ON B.MHRLS_SEQNO = C.MHRLS_SEQNO WHERE MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO = #{mhrlsEdayChckSeqno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RS_MHRLS_CL_DETECT_LIMIT( DETECT_LIMIT_SEQNO ,MHRLS_CL_CODE ,QU ,DETECT_LIMIT_BELO_VALUE ,COA_MARK_VALUE ,BEFORE_DETECT_LIMIT_BELO_VALUE ,BEFORE_COA_MARK_VALUE ,APPLC_BEGIN_DTE ,APPLC_END_DTE ,USE_AT,DELETE_AT ,LAST_CHANGER_ID ,LAST_CHANGE_DT ,RM ,YEAR ,EXPRIEM_SEQNO ,MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO) SELECT SQ_RS_MHRLS_CL_DETECT_LIMIT.NEXTVAL , IA.MHRLS_CL_CODE , #{qu} AS QU , RTRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(IA.STDDEV_RESULT_VALUE, 3), 'FM9990.000'),'.') AS DETECT_LIMIT_BELO_VALUE , RTRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(IA.STDDEV_RESULT_VALUE, 3), 'FM9990.000'),'.') AS COA_MARK_VALUE , RTRIM(TO_CHAR(CEIL(IA.STDDEV_RESULT_VALUE)/1000, 'FM9990.000'),'.') AS BEFORE_DETECT_LIMIT_BELO_VALUE , RTRIM(TO_CHAR(CEIL(IA.STDDEV_RESULT_VALUE)/1000, 'FM9990.000'),'.') AS BEFORE_COA_MARK_VALUE , #{applcBeginDte} AS APPLC_BEGIN_DTE , #{applcEndDte} AS APPLC_END_DTE , 'Y' AS USE_AT , 'N' AS DELETE_AT , #{lastChangerId} AS LAST_CHANGER_ID , SYSDATE AS LAST_CHANGE_DT , '기기 중간 점검 자동 등록' AS RM , #{year} AS YEAR , IA.EXPRIEM_SEQNO AS EXPRIEM_SEQNO , #{mhrlsEdayChckSeqno} AS MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO FROM ( SELECT F.MHRLS_CL_CODE , D.EXPRIEM_SEQNO , STDDEV(E.RESULT_VALUE)*3.14 AS STDDEV_RESULT_VALUE FROM RS_MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK A INNER JOIN RS_MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_REQEST B ON A.MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO = B.MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO INNER JOIN IM_REQEST C ON B.REQEST_SEQNO = C.REQEST_SEQNO INNER JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM D ON C.REQEST_SEQNO = D.REQEST_SEQNO INNER JOIN IM_REQEST_EXPRIEM_RESULT E ON D.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO = E.REQEST_EXPRIEM_SEQNO AND E.EXPR_NUMOT = 1 AND E.EXPR_ODR = 1 INNER JOIN RS_MHRLS F ON C.MHRLS_SEQNO = F.MHRLS_SEQNO WHERE A.MHRLS_EDAY_CHCK_SEQNO = #{mhrlsEdayChckSeqno} AND A.INSPCT_CRRCT_SE_CODE = 'IM10000002' GROUP BY F.MHRLS_CL_CODE, D.EXPRIEM_SEQNO ) IA
